explanation: This lineup is from the Solomon Warriors' historic 4-2 victory against AS Magenta in the 2020 OFC Champions League group stage. This match is considered one of the club's most significant performances, showcasing their attacking prowess and tactical discipline. The victory was crucial as it marked a high point in the club's continental history, demonstrating their ability to compete strongly against established regional teams. Young star Raphael Lea'i's standout performance further highlighted the club's potential and talent development.
